tit.e: Chichibu no kuni no miyatsuko (regional governor in ancient Japan)
tit.cmt: (government post) government postには違いないと思いますが、これだと中央官僚のようにも聞こえるので、regional governor in ancient Japan（古代日本の地域の統括者）としました。
tit.e: Chichibu no kuni no miyatsuko (regional governor in ancient Japan)

sen.j: 知々夫国造（ちちぶのくにのみやつこ・ちちぶこくぞう)は武蔵国西部を支配した国造。
sen.e: Chichibunokuninomiyatsuko 知々夫国造 was kuninomiyatsuko ruled the west part of Musashi Province.
Chichibu no kuni no miyatsuko (知々夫国造) was a kuni no miyatsuko, who ruled the west part of Musashi Province.
Chichibu no kuni no miyatsuko (知々夫国造) was a kuni no miyatsuko, who ruled the west part of Musashi Province.

sen.j: 天児屋命と同一神説がある。
sen.e: There is an opinion that Omoikanenomikoto is identical with Amenokoyanenomikoto.
There is a theory that identifies Omoikane no mikoto with Amenokoyane no mikoto.
There is a theory that identifies Omoikane no mikoto with Amenokoyane no mikoto.

sen.j: 『国造本紀』には崇神朝に10世孫の知知夫命が知々夫国造に任じられたとある。
sen.e: According to "Kuninomiyatsuko hongi", Chichibunokuninomikoto, the 10th descendant from Omoikanenomikoto, was appointed Chichibunokuninomiyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Sujin.
According to "Kuni no miyatsuko hongi", Chichibu no kuni no mikoto, the 10th descendant from Omoikane no mikoto, was appointed as Chichibu no kuni no miyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Sujin.
According to "Kuni no miyatsuko hongi," Chichibu no kuni no mikoto, the 10th descendant from Omoikane no mikoto, was appointed as Chichibu no kuni no miyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Sujin.

sen.j: 天上腹・天下腹...... 景行朝の人。
sen.e: Amanouehara, Amanoshitahara: Active during the reign of Emperor Keiko.

sen.j: 大伴部氏の祖？磐鹿六狩命に従って天皇に料理を献上した。
sen.e: They are supposed to be the ancestor of the Ootomobe clan, and cooked for the Emperor under the order of Iwakamutsuakrinomikoto.

sen.j: 大伴部赤男 ...... 奈良時代の武蔵国入間の豪族。
